title: Perfect Apple Pie
directions: Heat oven to 425 degrees. Place 1 pie crust in ungreased 9 inch glass pie plate. Press firmly against side and bottom.

In a large bowl, gently mix filling ingredients; spoon into crust lined pie plate. Top with second crust. Wrap excess top crust under bottom crust edge, pressing edges together to seal; flute. Cut slits or shapes in several places in top crust.

Bake 40 to 45 minutes or until apples are tender and crust is golden brown. Cover edge of crust with 2 to 3 inch wide strops of foil after the first 15 to 20 minutes of baking to prevent excessive browning. Cool on cooling rack at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 box Pillsbury refrigerated pie crusts, softened as directed on box.
6 cups thinly sliced, peeled apples (6 medium)
